description:
Keyaruga takes his revenge on a so-called hero, but not before learning Norn has a plan. If he ever has to deal with the princess, he may also have to deal with Trist Organ.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Der Heiler und die grausame Norn!
Kaifuku Jutsushi wa, Norn no Bankou ni Kokoro o Itameru!
The Healer Is Troubled by Norn`s Brutality!
回復術士は, ノルンの蛮行に心を痛める!
